description: This file declares functions for generating and broadcasting watchdog events within a system. It includes initialization, shutdown, and event broadcasting functionalities related to watchdog services, specifically for the iControl processes.

methods.name: startWatchdogEventProducer
methods.description: Initializes the watchdog event producer so it can start broadcasting events.

methods.name: stopWatchdogEventProducer
methods.description: Shuts down the watchdog event producer, stopping event broadcasts.

methods.name: broadcastWatchdogEvent
methods.description: Broadcasts a watchdog event to listeners with specified event code, value, and associated service or group name.
